name: CopilotKit
description: CopilotKit is an agentic framework that enables developers to build AI copilots into applications, offering customizable UI components and support for various LLM and agent frameworks.
longDescription: CopilotKit is designed as an Agentic Application Framework, providing tools to integrate AI copilots into user-facing applications with ease. Its mission is to empower developers to create intelligent, intent-oriented interfaces for SaaS and productivity applications, enhancing user experience through contextual assistance and automation. It supports connectivity with any large language model (LLM) and agent frameworks via the AG-UI protocol, catering to both AI teams needing low-level control and product teams seeking drop-in solutions. The framework offers versatile modes, from headless UI to pre-built customizable components, ensuring flexibility for different development needs. It serves users by amplifying productivity and transforming application interactions, such as dashboard management and form filling, into more natural and efficient experiences.
features: Allows building AI copilots into applications with a single command using "npx copilotkit@latest init."
Supports integration with any LLM, including OpenAI, Gemini, Anthropic, and Grok.
Offers headless UI for full customization and pre-built customizable components for ease of use.
Enables creation of intent-oriented interfaces for SaaS applications, enhancing user journey with contextual assistance.
Provides productivity copilots that automate workflows and amplify core productivity for employees and users.
Includes examples like AI-powered dashboard assistants and conversational form-filling tools, built with React and TypeScript.
Supports connection with agent frameworks like LangChain, CrewAI, and Llama-Index via the AG-UI protocol.
Offers versatile modes, allowing low-level control for AI teams and drop-in solutions for product teams.
Trusted by major companies like Cisco, Deloitte, and Tripadvisor, with over 22.3k GitHub stars and 100k+ developers.

faqs.question: What is CopilotKit?
faqs.answer: CopilotKit is an agentic framework for building AI copilots into applications, supporting various LLMs and agent frameworks.

faqs.question: How do I get started with CopilotKit?
faqs.answer: Start with a single command, "npx copilotkit@latest init," to initialize the framework in your project.

faqs.question: Does CopilotKit offer a free plan?
faqs.answer: Yes, it implies free access as it allows starting with a command without mention of paid-only features. As an open-source framework, core features are available for free.

faqs.question: What types of applications can I build with CopilotKit?
faqs.answer: You can build SaaS copilots, productivity copilots, and applications like dashboard assistants or form-filling tools.

faqs.question: Which LLMs are supported by CopilotKit?
faqs.answer: It supports LLMs like OpenAI, Gemini, Anthropic, Grok, and others.

faqs.question: Can I customize the UI with CopilotKit?
faqs.answer: Yes, it offers headless UI for full customization and pre-built customizable components.

faqs.question: What is the AG-UI protocol?
faqs.answer: The AG-UI protocol allows connecting any compatible agent framework into user-facing applications.

faqs.question: Is CopilotKit suitable for both AI and product teams?
faqs.answer: Yes, it offers low-level control for AI teams and drop-in solutions for product teams.

faqs.question: What are some example use cases?
faqs.answer: Examples include AI-powered dashboard interactions and conversational form-filling assistants.

faqs.question: Who trusts CopilotKit?
faqs.answer: It is trusted by companies like Cisco, Deloitte, Tripadvisor, and has over 22.3k GitHub stars.

faqs.question: Does CopilotKit support productivity enhancement?
faqs.answer: Yes, it builds agentic applications that amplify core productivity through automation and smart workflows.
